SummaryEnglish: Naoko Watanabe is your typical tween girl. That is, until she gets angry. When her anger exceeds a maximum level, she turns into Gauko, the fire-breathing dinosaur girl.

1.TitleEnglish: Nice to meet you. I'm Gauko
1.SummaryEnglish: It's Naoko's first day at her new school, and she's running late. But once she gets there, she has a really tough time

2.SummaryEnglish: Naoko and her new friends stop for croquettes at the meat shop and meet Toshio, a cute employee. The alien Bibilian shows up and causes trouble.

3.SummaryEnglish: School picture day arrives, and Naoko has a pimple under her nose! So does Kana, so they try to hide them. But Naoko also has to worry about Gauko.

4.SummaryEnglish: After one too many food-related annoyances, Naoko turns into Gauko. But then she finds she can't change back!

5.SummaryEnglish: Naoko's classmate Takashi Yamada keeps inviting her to play sports with him. She doesn't know why, and he's driving her crazy.

6.SummaryEnglish: Keisuke Saito tells Naoko she shouldn't get angry all the time and gives her tips on how to stay calm. But Naoko's friends don't like the change.

7.SummaryEnglish: One morning, Naoko is already Gauko -- and no one knows why she's angry. Hoping to turn her back, her friends take turns apologizing.

8.SummaryEnglish: Naoko's father has been acting strangely, so she and her mother decide to spy on him after work.

9.SummaryEnglish: After she gets good news from a fortune telling restaurant, Naoko visits Toshio's shop. But she's not the only one whose look matches the horoscope.

10.SummaryEnglish: Keisuke Saito asks Dinosaur Police Gauko to track down miscreants around school and keep the peace. But she gets very enthusiastic about her new role.

11.SummaryEnglish: After visiting her mole friend Leonard, Naoko starts to think that an underground lifestyle might be the answer to all of her problems.

12.SummaryEnglish: When Gauko accidentally breaks Mr. R3, she and her friends take him to the repair shop, where they learn that Toshio's Grandpa is his creator.

13.SummaryEnglish: Naoko tries to confess her feelings to Toshio but winds up helping out at the store instead. She's happy -- until he makes an enraging comment.

14.SummaryEnglish: Rumors spread about a huge monster who appears on the riverbank at night. When Naoko denies it's Gauko, her classmates go out to investigate.

15.SummaryEnglish: Mutchan always seems happy and cheerful, so Naoko decides to be just like her. But she soon realizes that people are taking advantage of her kindness.

16.SummaryEnglish: When Babu Lisa falls into a lake on a field trip, the lake goddess lets Naoko choose whether she wants the real Babu Lisa back -- or a "good" one.

17.SummaryEnglish: Grandpa is finally ready to test his Gauko-battling robot, Mecha Gauko! To defeat her counterpart, Gauko needs her friends' help.

18.SummaryEnglish: Naoko's poem notebook gets turned in as homework. Despite her efforts to stop it, her latest love poem to Toshio spreads on social media.

19.SummaryEnglish: Still determined to defeat Gauko, Grandpa decides to strike at her weak point: Toshio. Facing Robo-Toshio, Gauko isn't her usual powerful self.

20.SummaryEnglish: The aliens are ordered home after failing to conquer the Earth. Everyone throws them a farewell party, but Naoko is happy to see Bibilian go.

1.SummaryEnglish: Everyone keeps thanking Naoko for things she didn't do. Eventually she realizes the truth: There's an impostor Gauko on the loose!

2.SummaryEnglish: Naoko and her dad both forget her mom's birthday. They come up with a plan to celebrate at the last minute, but complications arise.

3.SummaryEnglish: Things are going missing around town. Naoko learns that the thefts are part of Bibilian's invasion plan, and she's not happy about it.

4.SummaryEnglish: Naoko goes to a community meeting in her parents' place. But when a discussion about a new community center turns into an argument, Gauko intervenes.

5.SummaryEnglish: When Naoko's mom spoils the ending of her favorite TV show, Naoko gets upset and runs away â€“ to Bibilian's house! But the alien isn't a very good host.

6.SummaryEnglish: KinPika the penguin is late to school one day. Naoko asks him about what's bothering him, and he invites her over to his very fancy house.

7.SummaryEnglish: Bibilian orders a copy machine and decides to make clones of Naoko until one of them agrees to date him. When Naoko finds out, she gets angry!

8.SummaryEnglish: After Naoko gets another bad grade on a math test, her father decides to take up boxing to encourage her to never give up.

9.SummaryEnglish: When Mr. R3 suddenly explodes one day, the class launches an investigation into the incident. They quickly realize that everyone's a suspect.

10.SummaryEnglish: Everyone is uploading videos of themselves singing to social media. Saito criticizes them at first, but soon enough he wants in on the action.

11.SummaryEnglish: Naoko's mom suddenly doesn't remember her, and no one else in town does either! It turns out Bibilian and his family are giving out brainwashing candy.

12.SummaryEnglish: Naoko's cousin Ichiro comes to visit, along with his snake puppet, Elizabeth. When Elizabeth says one too many mean things, he throws her in the river!

13.TitleEnglish: My Cousin and the Snake return
13.SummaryEnglish: Ichiro and Elizabeth come to visit again just as Naoko and her mom are about to go shopping, so they hang out with Leonard and the Moles.

14.SummaryEnglish: Under pressure to deliver results, Bibilian orders a world domination machine, only to learn that he has to wait two years for a missing part.

15.SummaryEnglish: Naoko enjoys being a big sister to Leonard, but she gets jealous when his soccer ambitions lead him to start hanging out with Takashi.

16.SummaryEnglish: To drum up business, the cat cafe offers a cooking class. Naoko, Mrs. Mole and KinPika sign up, but the proprietors aren't being totally honest.

17.SummaryEnglish: To speed up his conquest of Earth, Bibilian runs for president. But he faces a tough opponent: KinPika's father, who bribes people to vote for him!

18.SummaryEnglish: Naoko and her friends visit Toshio at the shop, but they get locked in the walk-in freezer. To escape, everyone tries to get Gauko to appear.

19.SummaryEnglish: The samba competition approaches. Naoko unhappily agrees to join Toshio's samba team, whose big rival is the team led by Naoko's mother!
